content:
Yes, The Lime Leaf Thai Restaurant in Basingstoke does have vegetarian options. Some of the popular vegetarian dishes on their menu are:

1. Tofu Pad Thai – stir-fried noodles with tofu, bean sprouts, peanuts, and a sweet and sour tamarind sauce. 2. Vegetarian Spring Rolls – crispy spring rolls filled with vegetables. 3. Panang Vegetables – a mild curry made with mixed vegetables, kaffir lime, and coconut milk. 4. Som Tam – a spicy salad made with shredded green papaya, tomatoes, chili, and peanuts. 5. Thai Green Curry Tofu – a spicy curry with tofu, green beans, and bamboo shoots. These are just a selection of vegetarian options available at The Lime Leaf Thai Restaurant, but as mentioned previously, it's always best to check with the restaurant directly or on their menu to see their full range of options.
